excessive_emojis.description: More than 8 emojis in a single message

link_spam.description: More than 2 links in a message

hashtag_spam.description: More than 5 hashtags in a message

character_insertion.description: Words with asterisks or other characters inserted

homoglyph_substitution.description: Visually similar characters from different alphabets

version_history.changes: Added multi-language support and leetspeak detection
